SELECT * FROM this WHERE City = '臺北市' AND Department Name = '急診醫學科' ORDER BY _id_ ASC
“Department Name” （要 double quote）
不過這因為是展開的，得要 self join 才能 filter "有急診醫學” “無燒燙傷"
@clkao:   OK , 瞭解

<https://sheethub.com/clementtang/%E9%86%AB%E4%BA%8B%E6%A9%9F%E6%A7%8B%E8%A8%BA%E7%99%82%E7%A7%91%E5%88%A5%E8%B3%87%E6%96%99/sql?sql=SELECT+*+FROM+this+WHERE+City+%3D+%27%E8%87%BA%E5%8C%97%E5%B8%82%27+AND+%22Department+Name%22+%3D+%27%E6%80%A5%E8%A8%BA%E9%86%AB%E5%AD%B8%E7%A7%91%27+ORDER+BY+_id_+ASC>
slackbot1's url: [SQL: SELECT * FROM this WHERE City = '臺北市' AND "Department Name" = '急診醫學科' ORDER BY _id_ ASC || 醫事機構診療科別資料]
@muyueh: @clkao    有辦法Cross join 2 個db 應該就完成了
或者 array_agg(“Department Name”) @> … 再加 group by Name .. 不過 sheethub 應該不支援
好像也不能 新北市 OR 台北市 OR 桃園縣
要分開寫... 不過好像 paren parsing 有問題... 也不支援 City in (‘….’, ‘…')
嗯，還沒支援 IN (xxx,xxx) ，所以要用 City='新北市' OR City='台北市' ...
